subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Golden State is three wins from tying the Chicago Bulls (1995-96) for the longest home winning streak in N.B.A. history and at 46-4 is tied for the best record ever after 50 games.
snippet: Golden State is three wins from tying the Chicago Bulls (1995-96) for the longest home winning streak in N.B.A. history and at 46-4 is tied for the best record ever after 50 games.
